comments.body: what about `"TString&"` and `TString*`? Do they need special cases?

I kept the two ones that are present in the current PyROOT (`TString` and `const TString&`). I can easily add `TString&`, but `TString*` does not work with the converter macros for strings of Cppyy, and it is a more complex case (it can mean an array of `TString`).
